content:
### [Sovereign Search: site:en.wikipedia.org Old Persian cuneiform chart]

1. **Old Persian cuneiform - Wikipedia**
   URL: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Persian_cuneiform
   Snippet: Persian cuneiform was later replaced (around 400 BC) by the introduction of the Aramaic script. The most recent known cuneiform text, an astronomical table, dates from AD 75.
